name: Sophie's Emporium of Potions and Magical Oddities
name_original: Sophie's Emporium of Potions and Magical Oddities
description: Meet Sophie, an apprentice of a magic shop who is tasked with practicing with the ingredients and perfecting all the potion recipes. But the master has hidden away all of the ingredients as a challenge for Sophie. The player will have to help Sophie unlock all the ingredients by deciphering clues and solving puzzles and then successfully brewing all the required potions by following the Master's instruction.
